post.body: I think so, we're pretty close.. .how about you?
There you are!!! Hi honey!
We can tweet from across the room... LOL
I know.. isn't it great!.. and he's sitting right next to me, too. Here's his twitter page: http://snipr.com/8jswg
My dog has a stocking hanging by the fireplace.. He'll most likely get a new bone.
Wasn't that hysterical with those stuff animals? I found that site by doing a google search on "gifts for 8 year old girls"
I understand that. We had a neighborhood cookie xchange on Sunday.. more candy than cookies.. about 8 10 dozen worth.
Oooh, that looks yummy, Kelly!
Who did I switch to regarding what?
Be my guest!
Your holiday cards should be between you & the person you're sending them to, not you, the recipient & the company that made them
of course... probably some marketing exec who doesn't even use his own product
I would not be happy about that, either.
I said the same thing 3 days ago..
Thanks, Lauren! That was taken at Matt's commissioning ceremony in May. Sean was able to fly up to attend.
Absolutely, Lauren.. the coolest tool since the bread slicer. Ours is a custom photo, too. http://snipr.com/8h0km
It's beautiful, but I'll be sick of it by Feb. After a while, there's no place to put it. Next year, buying cross ctry skis
oops! yw.. @toddschager sent that to me the other day. Emily loved it.
yw. Isn
Do you have a picture of your family that you can put in a really nice frame?
Good for you for resisting! I'm afraid I'm weak when it comes to Christmas cookies.
It is, Val.. I love gingerbread.
Yes, I've eaten way too many Christmas cookies already... and it's so snow outside, I can't even go out and run.
Yum! We made gingerbread cookies the other day. http://bit.ly/Cuw4
I know.. This one is going to Germany, so hopefully it will get there.
My husband is now on Twitter... Honey, you out there ??? (LOL)
The new scoop: So What DO You Do @http://zz.gd/81df4b
Campbell's Soup can servings says 2 1/2. I'd like to know 2 1/2 what ? because it's definitely not going to feed 2 1/2 people.
to have to totally redesign the card all over again.
Thank you to @starlightlife
The new scoop: Merry Christmas! @http://zz.gd/0a02a6
Logging off now for the next couple of days. Have a wonderful Christmas everyone!
New TweetDeck update not showing "Replies" in column. Anyone else having trouble?
Snowing.... again. I think there have more days that it's snowed since we've been back that not. At least 2+ feet on the ground.
Morning all and Merry Christmas Eve! Emily now has proof that Santa is real. http://bit.ly/oxbU
Cool people: @Debbas
Time for dinner.. I don't know what Doug has cooking, but it sure smells good! tweet you all later.
Mailman just driving up now...6 hours later than usual. More snow arrived.. At least 2+ feet outside and more on the way.
Thanks to @ericasfish, @mommywood
Computer back up and running. Thank you to #hpcompaq for building a system recovery that does not delete my data.
